column5: forming a complete chapter or essay

column15: 与 is used more commonly in written Chinese (Ci Yuan '與' 5; Kroll 2015 '與' 3)
An intransitive verb indicating motion towards the speaker (Ho 2002, '来' 1; NCCED '来' 1)
Traditional: 髮; as in hair on the head (Guoyu '髮' n 1; Unihan '髮')

column5: to send out / to issue / to emit / to radiate
column15: Traditional: 發; as in 发出 (GCED '發'; Guoyu '發' v 1; Han Dian '发' 4)

column5: flower and bear fruit / results follow hard work
to bond / to tie / to bind
column15: (ABC 'jié' 结 v 1, 3; CCD '结' jié 1; Kroll 2015 '結' 1a)
In the sense of 真正 or 真確; for example, the idiom 实事求是 'to handle matters according to the actual situation' (CCI '实事求是'; Guoyu '實' adj 4; Kroll 2015 '實' 3, p. 412; Unihan '實'; XHZD '实' 2, p. 678)
